modName: Random Vampire Attacks in Towns Disabled
summary:
Disables vampire attacks randomly happening when you enter towns at nighttime which was added by Dawnguard.

All other vampire encounters are left intact (wilderness, eclipse ect).
descriptionHtml:
Disables vampire attacks randomly happening when you enter towns at nighttime which was added by Dawnguard.

All other vampire encounters are left intact (wilderness, eclipse ect).


I was rather unhappy with the other solutions created, unlike the other mods I went for the root cause; the events them selves (DLC1VQ00VampireAttackNodeAM, DLC1VQ00VampireAttackNodePM). No scripts! No blanket edits!
author: Quarn

files.name: Random Vampire Attacks in Towns Disabled
